svg.title: Recursive SVG
svg.desc: An SVG with two recursive image reference to itself. One reference uses the file name as a relative URL, the other uses a target fragment only. When viewed in a processing mode that supports external file references, the embedded images should be rendered; however, the embedded image must be processed in secure mode, so the recursion only happens once. The appearance should be three nested red circles in a bulls-eye pattern; the innermost circle has solid fill because of target styles.
